changeSet.author: lschlesinger
changeSet.sql: UPDATE post, ( -- get all posts with exercise_id but without course_id -> create lookup: post_id | course_id SELECT post.id, ex.course_id FROM post INNER JOIN exercise ex ON post.exercise_id = ex.id WHERE post.course_id IS NULL UNION -- get all posts with lecture_id but without course_id -> create lookup: post_id | course_id SELECT post.id, lect.course_id FROM post INNER JOIN lecture lect ON post.lecture_id = lect.id WHERE post.course_id IS NULL ) post_id_course_id_lookup -- set course_id in post table to the course_id retrieved from the created lookup table SET post.course_id = post_id_course_id_lookup.course_id WHERE post.id = post_id_course_id_lookup.id;
